mapper.select: SELECT BRDCST_TRMNL_SE as se, BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm, BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb, BRDCST_TRMNL_TELNO as telno, BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as lc, BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as la, BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lo FROM sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view

SELECT tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb , DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d') as dt , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as addr , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as lat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lon FROM sejong.weather_view tt1 LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dt}
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{se} AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM like concat_ws(#{nm}, '%', '%')
GROUP BY innb, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb , DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d') as dt , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as addr , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as lat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lon FROM sejong.awsdata_view tt1 LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dt}
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{se} AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM like concat_ws(#{nm}, '%', '%')
GROUP BY innb, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb, TEMP_DATA as tempData, HUMI_DATA as humiData, WDIR_DATA as wdirData, WSPD_DATA as wspdData, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as dt FROM sejong.awsdata_view
BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = ${innb} AND DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dt}

SELECT
T1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb, T3.MESURE_DATA as data, DATE_FORMAT(T1.MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as dt, T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as lat, T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lon , T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as addr , T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE as se , T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm FROM ( SELECT BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB , max(MESURE_DT) MESURE_DT FROM sejong.weather_view WHERE DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{dat} GROUP BY BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB ) T1
JOIN sejong.weather_view T3 ON T1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = T3.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB and T1.MESURE_DT = T3.MESURE_DT LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view T2 on T1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = T2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB WHERE BRDCST_TRMNL_SE IN ('B03101','B03103')

SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' ) AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y') dat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}), 1) avg , round(max(${valueType}), 1) max , round(min(${valueType}), 1) min , round(sum(${valueType}), 1) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1
LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE MESURE_DT >= '2018-01-01' and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY item, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y') ) utt1 GROUP BY item UNION ALL ( SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.year}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' )
AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y') dat , '차트' AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}), 1) avg , round(max(${valueType}), 1) max , round(min(${valueType}), 1) min , round(sum(${valueType}), 1) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1
LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE MESURE_DT >= '2018-01-01' and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y') ) utt2 )

SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' ) AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%m') dat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}), 1) avg , round(max(${valueType}), 1) max , round(min(${valueType}), 1) min , round(sum(${valueType}), 1) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1
LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE MESURE_DT >= '${year}-01-01' AND concat(${year}+1, '-01-01') > MESURE_DT and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY item, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%m') ) utt1 GROUP BY item UNION ALL ( SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.month}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' ) AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%m') dat , '차트' AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}), 1) avg , round(max(${valueType}), 1) max , round(min(${valueType}),1 ) min , round(sum(${valueType}),1 ) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1
LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE MESURE_DT >= '${year}-01-01' AND concat(${year}+1, '-01-01') > MESURE_DT and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%m') ) utt2 )

SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' )
AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%d') dat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}),2) avg , round(max(${valueType}),2) max , round(min(${valueType}),2) min , round(sum(${valueType}),2) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1
LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m') = '${year}-${month}'
and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY item, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%d') ) utt1 GROUP BY item UNION ALL ( SELECT item, '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col,
concat(
IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN avg END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN max END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN min END), '0'), ',' , IFNULL(SUM(CASE dat WHEN '${date.day}' THEN sum END), '0'), ';' ,
'' ) AS cate
FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%d') dat , '차트' AS item , '평균,최대,최소,합계' AS col , round(avg(${valueType}),2) avg , round(max(${valueType}),2) max , round(min(${valueType}),2) min , round(sum(${valueType}),2) sum
FROM sejong.${tableName} tt1 LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m') = '${year}-${month}' and tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = #{ctgory} AND ${valueType} <> 0
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM LIKE concat(#{nm}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%d') ) utt2 )

SELECT BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb, BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm
FROM sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view
WHERE BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = 'B03101'
ORDER BY nm
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb , DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d') as dt , SUM(tt1.MESURE_DATA) as data , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as addr , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as lat , tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lon FROM sejong.weather_view tt1 LEFT JOIN sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
AND tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = 'B03101'
GROUP BY innb, DATE_FORMAT(MESURE_DT, '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY nm

SELECT temp.innb, temp.nm, temp.addr, temp.lat, temp.lon, awsdata.MESURE_DT as dt, awsdata.TEMP_DATA as temp, awsdata.HUMI_DATA as humi, awsdata.WDIR_DATA as wdir, awsdata.WSPD_DATA as wspd FROM (
SELECT tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB as innb, MAX(MESURE_DT) as mesure_dt, tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_NM as nm, tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_LC as addr, tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_LA as lat, tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_LO as lon FROM sejong.brdcst_trmnls_view tt1 LEFT JOIN sejong.awsdata_view as tt2 on tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB = tt2.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB
WHERE tt1.BRDCST_TRMNL_SE = 'B03105'
GROUP BY innb
) AS temp
LEFT join sejong.awsdata_view as awsdata on temp.innb = awsdata.BRDCST_TRMNL_INNB and temp.mesure_dt = awsdata.MESURE_DT AND DATE_FORMAT(awsdata.mesure_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY nm ASC
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
